description: This table stores claim edit generation information.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EC_GEN_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user ID of the person who performed edit operations.

columns.name: EC_GEN_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date/time instance when the claim was edited.

columns.name: EC_GEN_NUM_LNS
columns.description: Stores the total number audit lines for the claim edit operation.

columns.name: EC_GEN_START_LN
columns.description: Stores the line number from where the audit starts for a particular claim edit.

columns.name: EC_GEN_NUM_AUDIT
columns.description: Stores the claim edit generation number for the audit.

columns.name: EC_GEN_START_AUDIT
columns.description: Stores the claim edit generation start audit number.

columns.name: EC_GEN_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item distinguishes initial values, user edited values, and values reset from edited back to system calculated values.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Original Values


Edited Values


Reset Values
